title: Magic Spells Sounds
description: 308 High-Quality Magic Sounds for video games or other types of media
longDescription:
Magic Spells Sounds

616 High-Quality Magic Spells Sounds (308 as the standard version of the sound, 308 with an echo enhancement to make the sound more interesting).


🔊 YouTube Preview (hear the video preview of the 308 SFX)

📜 Tracklist PDF  


Divided in:

⥴ Hardcore Spells

⥴ Hits / Impacts

⥴ Projectiles

⥴ Variety of spells (energy, destruction, dark, creepy, funny, ice, fire, reccharge, barriers, textural, water, wind, etc...)

⥴ Buff Spells

⥴ Attack Spells

⥴ Healing Spells

⥴ UI


More about the pack:

- Editable: Easy to generate more sounds if you alter pitch.

- Intuitive file naming.

- Very easy to implement in your game.

- Put more life to your game with this magic spells.

- A very good resource for magic sounds at a good price.

- You can use the original version and the echo enhancement together to create variations of the same spell.


*Bridge plugin is enabled
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 616

Number of Audio Cues: 616

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 32 minutes
